attributes.action: Ask programe and comercial makers to stop adding music over the programe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is almost impossible to hear what is being said in most programes today be it a film or play,commercial or even the news, as they add music to it drowing out what is being said.  It is most distressing to hard of hearing people and the elderly. It is about time they stopped this practice. It is a difficult task trying to complain to all the different companies and makers of films plays and comercials.If you have had enough of this noisy uneccesary additon to your enjoyment. Please sign this.
